import React from 'react'; import { signInWithFacebook, signInWithGoogle } from '../fire'; const Login = (props) => { const {email, setEmail, password, setPassword, handleLogin, handleSignup, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError} = props; return (
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

{emailError}

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}

{hasAccount ? ( <>

Don't have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}>Sign up

):( <>

Have an Account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}> Sign in

)}




); }; export default Login;
